message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. Given its value and features, I'm offering it to you for $15,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. Considering its value, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, but I can't let this go for less than $13,000. It's a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
I've considered your counteroffer, Alice. While I respect the quality of the product, I believe we can still find common ground. I'd like to propose a price of $12,000.
